column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We got a pitcher of the CLASSIC SANGRIA which was delicious. For tapas we got the ANCHOVY TOAST which I found very good even with my disdain for anchovies! We got the PAPAS BRAVAS which were some of the best I've ever had
column2: and we also ordered the FRIED CHICKEN tapa which was my favorite. For PAELLA
column3: we got 2 of the small ones. The SEAFOOD
